description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Newcastle East, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Contemporary NSW Coastal Escape Steps from Newcastle Beach
hotels.description: Breathe in fresh sea air and bask in spectacular ocean views when you stay at Newcastle's only beachfront hotel, Noah's on the Beach. Just steps away from the city centre and harbour, along the shores of Newcastle Beach, this contemporary haven is perfectly appointed to explore the sites from land and sea. Dine on ocean-fresh seafood at Noah's restaurant, take long walks along the coast and experience the best of the city's after-hours fun in the heart of the city from this central base.

seo.title: Hoteles en Newcastle East - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Newcastle East, Australia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
